title: Comment from Alliance for American Leadership

analysis.key_quote: We firmly oppose the Office of Personnel Management’s (OPM) proposed reintroduction of “Schedule F.” This proposal threatens vital civil service protections, potentially affecting nearly 12,000 mission-critical civilians at the Department of Defense (DOD).
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of civil service protections and the risks of politicization in critical military roles, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
